thread.title: Ground News - WWII veteran celebrates 100th birthday aboard Battleship Iowa
thread.title_full: Ground News - WWII veteran celebrates 100th birthday aboard Battleship Iowa

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - WWII veteran celebrates 100th birthday aboard Battleship Iowa
text:
Summary by Ground News Lloyd Glick, a Navy petty officer that served as a bugler during WWII, celebrated his 100th birthday aboard the historic Battleship USS IOWA on Saturday Dec. 30, 2023. Fewer than 1% of Americans who served during World War II are still alive, according to the National WWII Museum. Share menu More

Daily Breeze Center High Factuality Private Equity: Alden Global Capital WWII veteran celebrates 100th birthday aboard Battleship Iowa Lloyd Glick, a Huntington Beach resident and WWII veteran, celebrated his 100th birthday aboard the Battleship Iowa in San Pedro on Saturday, Dec. 30.
